1.0.0.name: wordpress/meta-data-driven-wordpress-event-calendar
1.0.0.description: The metadata wordpress event calendar provides a nice GUI interface for adding upcoming events to each post or page. The metadata event calendar is driven by the Custom Field Template plugin by Hiroaki Miyashita. While you could do what I'm what I'm doing without the CFT plugin, it would be much, much more time consuming.
